name: Eugene A. STANLEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS 1ST JUD. DIST., Respondent
name_abbreviation: Stanley v. Court of Common Pleas 1st Jud. Dist.

parties: Eugene A. STANLEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS 1ST JUD. DIST., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of June, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are GRANTED. The Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is directed to dispose of Petitioner’s pending filing within 120 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
46 A.3d 709
Eugene A. STANLEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS 1ST JUD. DIST., Respondent.
No. 36 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 14, 2012.
